Package org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.provider

Class XmlMetaDataProvider

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.provider.XmlMetaDataProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
MetaDataProvider
public class XmlMetaDataProvider extends Object implements MetaDataProvider
A MetaDataProvider providing constraint related meta data based on XML descriptors as defined by the Bean Validation API.
Author:
Gunnar Morling, Hardy Ferentschik

    <T> BeanConfiguration<T>
    getBeanConfiguration(Class<T> beanClass)
    Returns a bean configuration for the given type or null if this provider has no meta-data on the given type.
